column1: The Federal Reserve Board on Thursday released the minutes of its discount rate meetings from February 9 through March 15, 2004.The minutes are attached.Attachment (65 KB PDF) 2004 Monetary policy Home | News and events Accessibility Last update: May 13, 2004
